markdown:
Vampire counts rule their demesnes and subjects through a mix of fear and cruelty. **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 22 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17 [Vampire Count](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3225) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 336 1.1 **Perception** +17; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20); plus one regional language **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +14, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +14, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +16, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +14, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13 **Str** +5 **Dex** +3 **Con** +2 **Int** +2 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +4 **Children of the Night** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=579), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647)) **Items** [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), _+1 [rapier](/Weapons.aspx?ID=391)_ --- **AC** 24 **Fort** +11 **Ref** +14 **Will** +17 **HP** 65 (coffin restoration, [fast healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=62) 7, [void healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=83)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=696) **Resistances** physical 7 (except [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644) [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2920)) **Vampire Vulnerabilities**
**Mist Escape** --- **Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet **Melee** _rapier_ +17 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [disarm +1](/Traits.aspx?ID=175)), **Damage** 1d6+11 piercing **Melee** claw +17 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 1d8+8 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45) **[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=55)** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127)) Giant bat with fangs +15 for 1d8+9 piercing (page 358). **Create Servitor** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Downtime](/Traits.aspx?ID=49)) **Dominate** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) DC 22 **Drink Blood** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) When Drinking Blood, the vampire count regains 10 HP. **Turn to Mist** ([Air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127))
name: Vampire Count

summary_markdown: Vampire counts rule their demesnes and subjects through a mix of fear and cruelty.
text: Vampire Count Vampire counts rule their demesnes and subjects through a mix of fear and cruelty. Recall Knowledge - Undead (Religion): DC 22 Unspecific Lore : DC 20 Specific Lore : DC 17 Vampire Count Source Monster Core pg. 336 1.1 Perception +17; darkvision Languages Common, Necril; plus one regional language Skills Acrobatics +13, Athletics +13, Deception +14, Diplomacy +14, Intimidation +16, Society +14, Stealth +13 Str +5 Dex +3 Con +2 Int +2 Wis +4 Cha +4 Children of the Night (divine, mental) Items Leather Armor, +1 rapier --- AC 24 Fort +11 Ref +14 Will +17 HP 65 (coffin restoration, fast healing 7, void healing) Immunities death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, sleep Resistances physical 7 (except magical silver) Vampire Vulnerabilities Mist Escape Free Action --- Speed 25 feet, climb 25 feet Melee Single Action rapier +17 (deadly d8, disarm +1), Damage 1d6+11 piercing Melee Single Action claw +17 (Agile), Damage 1d8+8 slashing plus Grab Change Shape Single Action (Concentrate, Divine, Polymorph) Giant bat with fangs +15 for 1d8+9 piercing (page 358). Create Servitor (Divine, Downtime) Dominate Two Actions (Divine, Incapacitation, Mental, Visual) DC 22 Drink Blood Single Action (Divine) When Drinking Blood, the vampire count regains 10 HP. Turn to Mist Single Action (Air, Concentrate, Divine, Polymorph)
